remarks: Derive a weakened version of ~ ax-6 ( i.e. ~ ax6v ), where ` x ` and ` y ` must be distinct, from Separation ~ ax-sep and Extensionality ~ ax-ext .  See ~ ax6 for the derivation of ~ ax-6 from ~ ax6v . (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2013.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ax6vsep $p |- -. A. x -. x = y $.
$d x y $.
